name: fire-lash
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.
